articles.title: American Shoppers Have Plenty of Dry Powder - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Consumers say they aren’t upbeat, but they will keep cash registers ringing this holiday season
articles.content:
Americans say they are worried about the economy, and there certainly are reasons to question the staying power of consumer spending. That doesnt mean they wont spend heartily this holiday season.

articles.description: The "American Horror Story" star shared an endearing story Tuesday about how the late "Friends" star ran lines with her ahead of an audition.
articles.content:
Sarah Paulson couldnt forget how generous Matthew Perry was if she dreamed.
